name: sfchronicle
text:
San Francisco’s Board of Supervisors reversed course on banning smoking in multi-unit buildings on a perfunctory second vote - a rare move - after protests from residents who said they could be hurt under the law.

via @MalloryMoench: https://t.co/oYeaKBXobw

name: sfchronicle
text:
“Howard was one of a kind, and an amazing B3 player,” said Terry Haggerty, guitarist with Sons of Champlin. “The thing with Howard is that he was so much better of a musician than anybody in the Grateful Dead.”

This assessment was backed by Jerry Garcia.

https://t.co/hta7t75tKK

name: sfchronicle
text:
Why is it so hard to see the 5-7 #49ers making an-against-the-odds run into the playoffs? It’s because their pass rush.

@Eric_Branch explains: https://t.co/YuF7vT5yMu
